Posts.Title: Before I ........

Posts.Content: I too had a lumpectomy in July 2013 with chemo and rads. At my first mammogram following treatment little calcified lumps were detected and following a lumpectomy it was decided I needed a mx. I was like you extremely worried and scared as to how it had come back so soon.  I am seeing a Macmillan counsellor as I'm finding it very hard to cope. Please seek help from your breast care nurse and ask if this service runs in your area. It does help even if some weeks I just sit and cry.  Good luck in your journey xx
Posts.Title: Recurrence

Posts.Content: Hi. Don't want to dishearten you but i applied for Pip in AUgust last year and hear nothing til deb, then on Tuesday received my letter telling me it had been awarded and the money was in my account. My friend has been waiting since oct and has been told they are being done in date order. Contact MacMillan welfare they were very helpful to me x
